name: Chobin II
overview: Chobin, a very good sailor, went to the seashore every morning to breathe int the good sea air, always immersed in his thoughts, he would never have imagined that one day he would have to face risks and dangers of all kinds. The fantastic adventure of our Chobin begins right by the sea one spring morning. While he was thinking of the strangest things as usual, he was disturbed by a noise, so he stood up and went to the source of this noise, at that point he found a barrel that pushed by the waves of the sea continues to crash upon the rocks. He picked up the bottle and saw that it contained a message, opened it and found a parchment bearing the following sentence: Bring the right object before the king's throne of the Turks and you will be rewarded with a stupendous treasure. Chobin did not have it repeated twice and immediately began his fantastic journey with his boat. You will control our Chobin in his adventure, but be careful to direct him to the right island with the right object, otherwise poor Chobin will suffer a bad end! Published in several Italian game compilations, including Special Program N°43 (05/1988) supplement: RUN/STOP The 64 Magic Games N°1, Hit Parade 64 N°65 (03/1992) and Hit Parade C64 n.31 (Febbraio 1989). Despite the game's name, there was no Chobin I.
